The examples above demonstrate a connection between human health and the treatment of animals. Awareness of this link grows. The One Health Initiative now fosters collaboration between veterinary and human health professionals, and works, for example, to improve detection of EIDS.
57 Although a positive step, this initiative misses a vital point that many EIDS are due at least partly to the treatment of animals. Yet, animal treatment is largely absent from public health dialogue. Current strategic policies, which do not fundamentally address animal treatment, are off the mark.
